name: similify
description: "Similify is a versatile JavaScript package designed to simplify and enhance similarity comparisons in various contexts. Whether you're comparing words, objects, arrays, or exploring string lengths and numerical ranges, Similify provides an easy-to-use interface with customizable thresholds. Effortlessly find the most similar instances and match percentages, making complex comparisons a breeze. Streamline your similarity analysis and unlock new possibilities with Similify."
